quagga.input.subject: FW: Power Player Lunch Meeting Notice
quagga.input.body:
you're now appearing on fliers!!!  What's next?  Movies?  A supporting role 
w/ Arnold??  :-) kd
---------------------- Forwarded by Karen Denne/Corp/Enron on 05/18/2001 
07:02 PM ---------------------------


Sandra Yamane <SYamane@marathon-com.com> on 05/18/2001 01:28:43 PM
To: "'karen.denne@enron.com'" <karen.denne@enron.com>
cc:  

Subject: FW: Power Player Lunch Meeting Notice


Karen:
Here is a copy of the LA Chamber flier for the June 5th energy event
featuring Jeff Dasovich

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffe, Jerald A. [mailto:jeffjera@lachamber.org]
Sent: Friday, May 18, 2001 11:23 AM
To: 'syamane@marathon-com.com'
Subject: Power Player Lunch Meeting Notice




 <<Energy Crisis - Power Player Speaker.doc>>

 For further communications on this matter, talk to Melissa Infusino.
I just helped out on the flyer while she was out of town.


 - Energy Crisis - Power Player Speaker.doc
